insert_into_test: INSERT INTO %s (name, status_id, method_name, project_id, session_id, start_time, end_time, env, browser, author_id) VALUES
check_test_for_presence: SELECT * FROM %s WHERE name = '%s' AND status_id = %d AND method_name = '%s' AND project_id = %d AND session_id = %d AND start_time = '%s' AND end_time = '%s' AND env = '%s' AND browser = '%s'
check_session_for_presence: SELECT * FROM %s WHERE session_key = '%s' AND created_time = '%s' AND build_number = %d
check_author_for_presence: SELECT * FROM %s WHERE name = '%s' AND login = '%s' AND email = '%s'
select_condition: SELECT * from %s WHERE id LIKE '%%%d%%%d%%' LIMIT 10
update_test_entry: UPDATE %s SET status_id = %d, start_time = '%s', end_time = '%s' WHERE id = %d
